selectedNotebook.title: Notebook
selectedNotebook.description: This is the notebook you want to use. If you don't have any notebooks, please create one first

botToken.title: Bot Token
botToken.description: Telegram Bot token. In order to start you need to create Telegram bot: https://core.telegram.org/bots#3-how-do-i-create-a-bot. Create a bot with BotFather, which is essentially a bot used to create other bots. The command you need is /newbot. After you choose title, BotFaher give you the token

pollingInterval.title: Polling interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: This interval will be used to get new messages from Telegram bot

inboxName.title: Title in daily journal
inboxName.description: Messages will be pasted in daily journal into block with text, specified in inboxName property. Replace it in case of necessary. If you don't want to group messages, set inboxName property to null. In this case messages will be inserted directly into page block

authorizedUser.title: Authorized username from Telegram
authorizedUser.description: Be sure to add your username here, because your recently created bot is publicly findable and other peoples may send messages to your bot. If you leave this empty - all messages from all users will be processed!

settings.loadError: Error loading settings storage, probly empty config json:

inboxComponent.emptyInbox: Let's send some messages to your Telegram bot!

errors.BotTokenRequiredError: In order to use this plugin, Telegram bot token is required, set it in plugin settings
